fields.description: When you ask if permission has been given for "WHEN_IN_USE" with Ti.Geolocation.hasLocationPermissions when in fact "ALWAYS" has been approved you get false. But, technically, when the user approves "ALWAYS" both ALWAYS and WHEN_IN_USE are approved, not only ALWAYS, as we're still allowed to get geolocation when the app is in use.
fields.summary: iOS: Ti.Geolocation.hasLocationPermissions returns false for WHEN_IN_USE when ALWAYS is approved

comments.body: We only pass the flags to the native API, so I guess Apple decides between both location-types. Let us check that anyway.
